author: Orion Rummler
title: FDA allows blood donations from gay men after 3-month waiting period, citing "urgent need"
description: Gay men, bisexual men and their female partners can now donate blood after a 3-month waiting period, instead of the previously required 12-month span, the Food and Drug Administration announced Thursday. What's happening: The Red Cross says the novel coronavi…
content:
Gay men, bisexual men and their female partners can now donate blood after a 3-month waiting period, instead of the previously required 12-month span, the Food and Drug Administration announced Thursday.
